name: The Empire State
startIntroPart1: War efforts provides purpose... and entertainment. War is Peace.
declaringWar: No hard feelings, this is all in the name of entertainment.
attacked: My loyal Strike Commander...  You are going to save many lives today.
defeated: My loyal Strike Commander...  You have failed your duty to protect the State.
introduction: The Empire State welcomes you, for now.
tradeRequest: We have an offer, do you accept?
